StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: REGARDS: Reasons for Geographic and Racial Differences in Stroke Cardiorenal GWAS

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was supported by grant R01HL136666 to Marguerite Irvin and Leslie Lange from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI), a part of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: “The original data description for the REGARDS cardiorenal GWAS study can be found here: (Journal Citation __________)(PMID __________). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs______.”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals are acceptable, and an ANNUAL IRB review is required base on the informed consents from the submitting institution.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB
